title: Sarfo Gyamfi blasts Sammy Kuffour, claims he talks too much
text:
Sports News | 8 October 2015 00:55 CET Sarfo Gyamfi blasts Sammy Kuffour, claims he talks too much - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Nicknamed the Black President, the outspoken former Ghana international mentioned in an interview that his only problem with the 'president elect' was coming out to announce his appointment ahead of Manhyia-his new employers. 
'â€¦Kuffuor is talking too much, what if Nana changes his mind of the decision to make him the new head of the club? We don't do that, it is untraditional.' 
'I took his number from someone so I can offer him a piece of advice on some of these things, but he refused to pick my call, maybe he doesn't know my number.' 
'He is a fine gentleman, everybody wants the club to succeed but he should have allowed Nana to officially announce him as the club's new head,' said Gyamfi. 
Reports from the Garden City of Kumasi indicated that Kuffuor would be unveiled this Friday as the club's new executive chairman to replace the Paul Adu Gyamfi-led board and Opoku Nti Management team.
